parse.title: List of California Institute of the Arts people

text.*:
This alumni list may not follow Wikipedia's verifiability or notability policies. Please improve this article by removing names that do not have independent reliable sources showing they are notable AND alumni, or by incorporating the relevant publications into the body of the article through appropriate citations. (March 2011)

Lists of notable alumni, faculty, and visiting artists of the California Institute of the Arts.
